auth_sentence.content: Thus a spectrogram is a series of individual spectra, one for each frame.
auth_sentence.res_content: Thus a spectrogram is a series of individual spectra, one for each frame.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Thus a spectrogram is a series of individual spectra, one for each frame.

auth_sentence.content: Speech recognition and speech separation typically works by moving along a spectrogram one frame at a time.
